net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_CharSheet_formatProficiency
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
<html><pre>Given a property representing a proficiency of one of the following values:
arg (0) = proficiency property value
0 = Not Proficient 0.5 = Half Proficient 1 = Proficient 2 = Expert
* Any value not in this list is treated as '0' - Not Proficient
Returns: a String representation:
O = Not Proficient ½ = Half ✓ = Proficient ✓✓ = Expert
